title: Fort Matanzas National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Hands On History Camp participants build a masonry arch. NPS Photo  First Hands on History camp at Fort Matanzas! Last year, the Castillo de San Marcos held its first ever Hands on History Camp. It was a huge success and in planning this year's camp, it was decided to have one session here at Fort Matanzas the week of July 21-25. All camps are full but you can read more about them here. And stay tuned for pictures of all the great camp activities!
